title: Bimetallic and Plasmonic Ag and Cu Integrated TiO2 Thin films for Enhanced Solar Hydrogen Production in Direct Sunlight

Plasmonic metal nanoparticle integrated mesoporous TiO2 nanocomposites (Ag/TiO2, Cu/TiO2 and Ag-Cu/TiO2), prepared by a simple chemical reduction method, has been demonstrated to show superior activity in thin-film form for solar...
